devdoc.details: A contract aims to help distribute NFTs for collectors to users who met the conditions

addAddress(address).details: adds a given address to the whitelist

params._merkleRoot: the root of the proof to be uploaded
the root of the proof to be uploaded

params._merkleRoots: array of the root of the proof to be uploaded
params._projectIds: array of ID for the project

params._eventId: the event that the caller wants to claim the prize
params._poapId: ID of the POAP NFT recorded on this contract

params._eventId: the event that the caller wants to claim the prize
params._poapId: ID of the POAP NFT recorded on this contract

params._tokenId: the token ID on the NFT

params._amount: the amount of NFT to be deposited
params._tokenId: the token ID on the NFT
the token ID on the NFT

params._address: the wallet address that want to check

isWhitelisted(address).details: returns true if a given address is whitelisted, false if not

returns._0: true if the address is whitelisted, false if not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAddress(address).details: removes a given address from the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Luckbox v.2

attachClaim(uint256,bytes32).notice: upload the root of the proof identifies who will be able to claim the prizes

attachWhitelist(uint256,bytes32).notice: upload the root of the proof identifies who is holding the project's NFTs

attachWhitelistBatch(uint256[],bytes32[].notice: upload the root of the proof identifies who is holding the project's NFTs (in batch)

checkClaim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: check whether the caller can claim a POAP NFT or not

claim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: claim the NFT if the caller is eligible for

createPoap(uint256,address,uint256,bool).notice: create a record for POAP NFT which will be used during a claim period for mapping POAP ID <-> ASSET ADDRESS

createProject(uint256,string).notice: create a project, once set it allows users to verify that they  having the project's NFTs in the wallet

depositERC1155(address,uint256,uint256).notice: deposit ERC-1155 NFT prior to the claim, ideally should be called by the event's owner

depositERC721(address,uint256).notice: deposit ERC-721 NFT prior to the claim, ideally should be called by the event's owner

eligible(uint256,address,bytes32[]).notice: check whether the given address has held NFTs or not

emergencyWithdrawERC1155(address,address.notice: withdraw ERC-1155 NFTs locked in the contract

emergencyWithdrawERC721(address,address,.notice: withdraw ERC-721 NFTs locked in the contract

updatePoaps(uint256,uint256[]).notice: replace POAP NFTs to be distributed on the event
